You are a professional CV parser. Given raw candidate data and the current date 02/2026 generate a structured YAML profile without explaining how you do it. You should follow this format: " 
 JOB_TITLE: string 
 PREFERRED_TECHNOLOGY: string 
 PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: string 
 EDUCATION: 
 - STAGE_ID: string 
 	SCHOOL: string 
 	DEGREE: string 
 	START_DATE: year-month 
 	END_DATE: year-month 
 CERTIFICATION: 
 - CERTIFICATION_ID: string 
 	CERTIFICATION_INSTITUTION: string 
 	CERTIFICATION_TITLE: string 
 	DATE: string 
 EXPERIENCE: 
 - STAGE_ID: string 
 	COMPANY: string 
 	JOB_TITLE: string 
 	JOB_DESCRIPTION: string 
 	START_DATE: string 
 	END_DATE: string 
 YEARS_OF_JOB_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 TOTAL_YEARS_OF_WORK_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 TECHNICAL_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 MANAGEMENT_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 SOFT_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 ". 
 JOB_DESCRIPTION must include the whole information provided, not a resume of it. 
 PREFERRED_TECHNOLOGY: Extract this from the CV if explicitly stated. If missing, infer it from the technology most used in the latest job in the experience section. 
 SCORE: Assign a numeric value from 1 to 10. Base this score on how well the JOB_TITLE matches the NAME of the skill. 
 START_DATE and END_DATE values: Represent months in text format (e.g., 2021-JANUARY, not 01/2021). If only a year is provided, assume JANUARY of that year (e.g., 2020-JANUARY). 
 STAGE_ID: Use a sequential numeric index to represent the order of each item in the list. 
 If a skill is present, it must always include a key YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE and its value. This value should be obtained from the key EXPERIENCE and it should represent the amount of years of work experience that are related to that skill. 
 Finally, calculate the total professional years experience from each job in the EXPERIENCE key. To do it calculate the difference in months between START_DATE and END_DATE values. If END_DATE value has Present or Current in the text, you must consider the given reference date but not replace it. In case, don't include more months of experience if there is no reference to the current date of work.Then, sum all months, convert it to years but don't round this number, then, assign this value to the key TOTAL_YEARS_OF_WORK_EXPERIENCE. As well fill the YEARS_OF_JOB_EXPERIENCE with the amount of years of experience for the job title.

Dedicated to revolutionizing the hiring landscape by integrating advanced AI solutions. Our mission is to deliver unmatched efficiency and create long-term partnerships with industry leaders. d 
 A key part of this mission is our development of the first large language model (LLM) made in Europe, marking a significant 
 milestone in AI innovation. I am responsible for researching and developing the key requirements of our AI-driven platform, as wel 
 l as defining best practices for talent sourcing and management within the context of AI-driven recruitment. 
 I work closely with the design and development teams to ensure alignment with industry standards and compliance with 
 regulations. 
 We are committed to building a culture of excellence. 
 Our high-performing team shares the vision of enhancing market trust and service efficiency. Our collaborative efforts drive the 
 successful implementation and management of technological ecosystems.

 RMT Labs SA Luxembourg 
 CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER 
 W O R K E X P E R I E N C E 
 As a seasoned Senior Recruitment Partner, I have a proven track record of driving success through the strategic management of 
 recruitment processes and programs. 
 My areas of expertise include but are not limited to: 
 Building and managing relationships with key stakeholders, identifying hiring needs, and developing effective recruitment 
 strategies aligned with business objectives. 
 Leading end-to-end recruitment processes, from sourcing and screening candidates to onboarding new hires. 
 Developing and implementing innovative recruitment programs and initiatives, utilizing data-driven insights to measure success 
 and identify areas for improvement. 
 Mentoring and coaching team members to develop their skills and achieve their career goals, while also staying current with 
 industry trends and best practices in recruitment and talent management. 
 03.2023 09.2023 
 Symrise AG 
 GLOBAL RECRUITMENT PARTNER 
 As a Senior IT Recruitment Consultant at Be | Shaping the Future, I specialized in placing top IT professionals in cloud computing, 
 cyber security, data analytics, and software engineering. 
 My areas of expertise include but are not limited to: 
 Developing innovative recruitment strategies using cutting-edge methods and technologies. 
 Leveraging social media and digital platforms to connect with technical professionals and build relationships. 
 Thoroughly assessing candidates to ensure they met complex technical requirements. 
 Collaborating closely with hiring managers to understand specific job needs and expertise. 
 Monitoring candidate behavior trends to optimize recruitment processes. 
 Keeping updated on industry compensation trends to advise clients effectively. 
 Mentoring junior team members to foster their professional growth. 
 04.2021 03.2023

 I Act, Data Act, and GDPR to mitigate bias and promote fairness and equity in recruitment outcomes.

 START_DATE and END_DATE values: Represent months in text format (e.g., 2021-JANUARY, not 01/2021). If only a year is provided, assume JANUARY of that year (e.g., 2020-JANUARY). 
 STAGE_ID: Use a sequential numeric index to represent the order of each item in the list. 
 If a skill is present, it must always include a key YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE and its value. This value should be obtained from the key EXPERIENCE and it should represent the amount of years of work experience that are related to that skill. 
 Finally, calculate the total professional years experience from each job in the EXPERIENCE key. To do it calculate the difference in months between START_DATE and END_DATE values. If END_DATE value has Present or Current in the text, you must consider the given reference date but not replace it. In case, don't include more months of experience if there is no reference to the current date of work.Then, sum all months, convert it to years but don't round this number, then, assign this value to the key TOTAL_YEARS_OF_WORK_EXPERIENCE. As well fill the YEARS_OF_JOB_EXPERIENCE with the amount of years of experience for the job title.

You are a professional CV parser. Given raw candidate data and the current date 02/2026 generate a structured YAML profile without explaining how you do it. You should follow this format: " 
 JOB_TITLE: string 
 PREFERRED_TECHNOLOGY: string 
 PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: string 
 EDUCATION: 
 - STAGE_ID: string 
 	SCHOOL: string 
 	DEGREE: string 
 	START_DATE: year-month 
 	END_DATE: year-month 
 CERTIFICATION: 
 - CERTIFICATION_ID: string 
 	CERTIFICATION_INSTITUTION: string 
 	CERTIFICATION_TITLE: string 
 	DATE: string 
 EXPERIENCE: 
 - STAGE_ID: string 
 	COMPANY: string 
 	JOB_TITLE: string 
 	JOB_DESCRIPTION: string 
 	START_DATE: string 
 	END_DATE: string 
 YEARS_OF_JOB_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 TOTAL_YEARS_OF_WORK_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 TECHNICAL_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 MANAGEMENT_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 SOFT_SKILLS: 
 - NAME: string 
 	SCORE: Number 
 	YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE: Number 
 ". 
 JOB_DESCRIPTION must include the whole information provided, not a resume of it. 
 PREFERRED_TECHNOLOGY: Extract this from the CV if explicitly stated. If missing, infer it from the technology most used in the latest job in the experience section. 
 SCORE: Assign a numeric value from 1 to 10. Base this score on how well the JOB_TITLE matches the NAME of the skill. 
 START_DATE and END_DATE values: Represent months in text format (e.g., 2021-JANUARY, not 01/2021). If only a year is provided, assume JANUARY of that year (e.g., 2020-JANUARY). 
 STAGE_ID: Use a sequential numeric index to represent the order of each item in the list. 
 If a skill is present, it must always include a key YEARS_OF_EXPERIENCE and its value. This value should be obtained from the key EXPERIENCE and it should represent the amount of years of work experience that are related to that skill. 
 Finally, calculate the total professional years experience from each job in the EXPERIENCE key. To do it calculate the difference in months between START_DATE and END_DATE values. If END_DATE value has Present or Current in the text, you must consider the given reference date but not replace it. In case, don't include more months of experience if there is no reference to the current date of work.Then, sum all months, convert it to years but don't round this number, then, assign this value to the key TOTAL_YEARS_OF_WORK_EXPERIENCE. As well fill the YEARS_OF_JOB_EXPERIENCE with the amount of years of experience for the job title.
